article_title: Why Are Investors Running Away From Medical Devices?

article_metadata.description: Photographer: Munshi Ahmed/Bloomberg Sabin Russell wrote a great piece in Health Affairs recently, on the drought in investment to develop new medical devices. Read it if you have access. If you don’t, here are some of her main points. 1. Venture capital for device manufacturers has been drying up for a while: [...]
article_metadata.author: Peter Ubel
